thread.title: New Smart Phone Revolutionizes the Mobile World With its First Ever Dual Screen
thread.title_full: New Smart Phone Revolutionizes the Mobile World With its First Ever Dual Screen

author: prbuzz.com
title: New Smart Phone Revolutionizes the Mobile World With its First Ever Dual Screen
text:
For Immediate Release
In the age of smart phones, Siam 7x by CRBT incredible style and exciting new features has managed to capture quite some attention.
23rd September, 2015: Siam smart phone is North America’s first dual screen phone with few of the most interesting features. Considered as “The phone of the future” the Dual Screen Siam 7x has managed to create a lot of hype among the population at large. The two screens offered can run independently helping the user dual-task.
Its other features include:
• Lifetime Warranty.
• It has two omni directional studio standard speakers.
• It also has an enhanced sound system to go with the speakers.
• The Kill switch feature helps prevent any wrong or unwanted activity and the satellite tracking helps track the whereabouts of the phone.
• It has Earprint Biometrics by Descartes Biometrics which is less likely to be hacked.
• It is waterproof making it more durable along with its lining of the hardest glass.
• It has a 16 megapixel front camera that helps take few of the clearest selfies.
• The Siam smartlease helps pay off make easier.
• Siam is unlocked GSM, which allows flexible with the most national and international carriers.
• All android games can be played on the Wi-Fi compatible TV screen.
About the Company: Siam is the smart phone company that has created the new smart phone with excellent features. Their phone has so far been appreciated quite a lot and they have been praised for the specialized features in the phone building.
